arts.ttl: Ukraine vs France match broadcast – Time and channel to watch the game
arts.sum: The French national team faces Ukraine this Friday at 8:45 PM CET. The match will take place at the Stadion Miejski, as part of the 2026 World Cup qualifying. Six players from Paris Saint-Germain are involved in this match: five for France: Lucas Chevalier, Lucas Hernandez, Désiré Doué, Ousmane Dembélé, and Bradley Barcola; and one […]

arts.ttl: Ukraine vs France – The French lineup is confirmed!
arts.sum: This Friday, the French national team will play Ukraine in the 2026 World Cup qualifiers at 8:45 p.m. at Stadion Miejski. A match that involved six Paris Saint-Germain players. Five on the French side: Lucas Chevalier, Lucas Hernandez, Désiré Doué, Ousmane Dembélé, and Bradley Barcola. One on the Ukrainian side: Ilya Zabarnyi. RMC Sport has […]

arts.ttl: Ukraine predicted XI v France: PSG’s Illia Zabarnyi to start
arts.sum: New Paris Saint-Germain signing Illia Zabarnyi will start for Ukraine against France in Friday night’s FIFA World Cup qualifier. Zabarnyi will start at the heart of the Ukraine defence in…

arts.ttl: France predicted XI v Ukraine: Kylian Mbappé to lead the line, Ousmane Dembélé and Hugo Ekitike benched
arts.sum: France kick off their Group D campaign to qualify for the 2026 World Cup tonight against Ukraine at Wroclaw’s Tarczynski Arena. With Didier Deschamps starting his final season as Les…

arts.ttl: Ukraine vs France – Big news for Ousmane Dembélé!
arts.sum: Preserved since the weekend due to muscle discomfort, Ousmane Dembélé (28, Paris Saint-Germain winger) returned to training with the French national team on Thursday evening. On the eve of the 2026 World Cup qualifying match against Ukraine, Didier Deschamps can count on his full squad, reports L’Équipe. “Rested since the start of the week because […]

arts.ttl: France XI vs Ukraine – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: France begin their 2026 World Cup qualification campaign with a challenge against Ukraine at the Tarczyński Arena in Wrocław, Poland on Friday. The Blue and Yellow host the former world champions on neutral soil as they continue to play their home fixtures abroad due to the ongoing war. arts.ttl: Ukraine vs France – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Ukraine and France lock horns in the opening round of FIFA World Cup 2026 qualifying in Poland on Friday. Both sides will be eager to get their campaign off to a winning start in Group D, which also features Iceland and Azerbaijan. arts.ttl: Ukraine vs France – The French lineup announced without Dembélé
arts.sum: This Friday, the French national team will play Germany in the 2026 World Cup qualifiers at 8:45 p.m. at the Stade de France. Five Paris Saint-Germain players, all French, were involved in the match: Lucas Chevalier, Lucas Hernandez, Désiré Doué, Ousmane Dembélé, and Bradley Barcola.
